info.author: Michael Kamensky
info.description:
UniCurses is a wrapper for Python 2.x/3.x that provides a unified set of Curses
functions on all platforms (MS Windows, Linux, and Mac OS X) with syntax close
to that of the original NCurses. To provide the Curses functionality on
Microsoft Windows systems it wraps PDCurses.
info.name: UniCurses
info.summary: A unified OS-independent Curses wrapper for Python
info.html_description: UniCurses is a wrapper for Python 2.x/3.x that provides a unified set of Curses functions on all platforms (MS Windows, Linux, and Mac OS X) with syntax close to that of the original NCurses. To provide the Curses functionality on Microsoft Windows systems it wraps PDCurses.
